languages.text: "Слуга Бога-Императора, взгляни на себя. Кому ты служишь, Человечеству или врагам его? Ты проливаешь кровь собратьев и смеешь говорить о правосудии?! Опусти оружие, если тебе дорога твоя душа!"

traits.locale_text: "Слуга Бога-Императора, взгляни на себя. Кому ты служишь, Человечеству или врагам его? Ты проливаешь кровь собратьев и смеешь говорить о правосудии?! Опусти оружие, если тебе дорога твоя душа!"

languages.text: "Look at yourself, servant of the God-Emperor. Whom do you serve? Humanity or its foes? How dare you speak of justice with kindred blood on your hands? Lower your weapon if you value your soul!"
languages.original_text: "Слуга Бога-Императора, взгляни на себя. Кому ты служишь, Человечеству или врагам его? Ты проливаешь кровь собратьев и смеешь говорить о правосудии?! Опусти оружие, если тебе дорога твоя душа!"

traits.locale_text: "Look at yourself, servant of the God-Emperor. Who do you serve? Humanity or its enemies? How dare you speak of justice, you spiller of kindred blood? Lower your weapon if you value your soul!"
"Look at yourself, servant of the God-Emperor. Who do you serve? Humanity or its enemies? How dare you speak of justice, you spiller of kindred blood? Lower your weapon if you value your soul!"
"Look at yourself, servant of the God-Emperor. Whom do you serve? Humanity or its foes? How dare you speak of justice with kindred blood on your hands? Lower your weapon if you value your soul!"
"Look at yourself, servant of the God-Emperor. Whom do you serve? Humanity or its foes? How dare you speak of justice with kindred blood on your hands? Lower your weapon if you value your soul!"
"Look at yourself, servant of the God-Emperor. Whom do you serve? Humanity or its foes? How dare you speak of justice with kindred blood on your hands? Lower your weapon if you value your soul!"
"Look at yourself, servant of the God-Emperor. Whom do you serve? Humanity or its foes? How dare you speak of justice with kindred blood on your hands? Lower your weapon if you value your soul!"

languages.text: "Seht Euch doch an, Diener des Gottimperators. Wem dient Ihr? Der Menschheit oder ihren Feinden? Wie könnt Ihr es wagen, von Gerechtigkeit zu sprechen, wenn das Blut Eurer Sippe an Euren Händen klebt? Senkt Eure Waffe, wenn Euch Eure Seele lieb ist!"
languages.original_text: "Look at yourself, servant of the God-Emperor. Whom do you serve? Humanity or its foes? How dare you speak of justice with kindred blood on your hands? Lower your weapon if you value your soul!"

traits.locale_text: "Seht Euch doch an, Diener des Gottimperators. Wem dient Ihr? Der Menschheit oder ihren Feinden? Wie könnt Ihr es wagen, von Gerechtigkeit zu sprechen, wenn das Blut Eurer Sippe an Euren Händen klebt? Senkt Eure Waffe, wenn Euch Eure Seele lieb ist!"

languages.text: « Regardez-vous, serviteur de l'Empereur-Dieu ! Au service de qui êtes-vous... l'humanité ou ses ennemis ? Comment osez-vous parler de justice avec le sang des vôtres sur les mains ? Si vous tenez à votre âme, baissez votre arme ! »
languages.original_text: "Look at yourself, servant of the God-Emperor. Whom do you serve? Humanity or its foes? How dare you speak of justice with kindred blood on your hands? Lower your weapon if you value your soul!"

traits.locale_text: « Regardez-vous, serviteur de l'Empereur-Dieu ! Au service de qui êtes-vous... l'humanité ou ses ennemis ? Comment osez-vous parler de justice avec le sang des vôtres sur les mains ? Si vous tenez à votre âme, baissez votre arme ! »

languages.text: “看看你自己吧，神皇的仆人。你是在为谁服务？是人类，还是人类之敌？你的手上沾满了同胞的鲜血，你还敢说什么正义？如果你还在乎你的灵魂，就立刻放下武器！”
languages.original_text: "Look at yourself, servant of the God-Emperor. Whom do you serve? Humanity or its foes? How dare you speak of justice with kindred blood on your hands? Lower your weapon if you value your soul!"

traits.locale_text: “看看你自己吧，神皇的仆人。你是在为谁服务？是人类，还是人类之敌？你的手上沾满了同胞的鲜血，你还敢说什么正义？如果你还在乎你的灵魂，就立刻放下武器！”

languages.text: 「神帝陛下の従者よ、自らを顧みよ。誰に仕えるのか？人類か、それともその敵か？同胞の血で手を染めながら、正義を語ろうというのか。その魂が大事ならば武器を下ろせ！」
languages.original_text: "Look at yourself, servant of the God-Emperor. Whom do you serve? Humanity or its foes? How dare you speak of justice with kindred blood on your hands? Lower your weapon if you value your soul!"

traits.locale_text: 「神帝陛下の従者よ、自らを顧みよ。誰に仕えるのか？人類か、それともその敵か？同族の血で手を染めながら、正義を語ろうというのか。その魂が大事ならば武器を下ろせ！」

languages.text: «Mírese, sirviente del Dios Emperador. ¿A quién sirve? ¿A la humanidad o a sus enemigos? ¿Cómo se atreves a hablar de justicia con las manos manchadas de sangre? ¡Baje el arma si valoras su vida!».
languages.original_text: "Look at yourself, servant of the God-Emperor. Whom do you serve? Humanity or its foes? How dare you speak of justice with kindred blood on your hands? Lower your weapon if you value your soul!"

traits.locale_text: «Mírese, sirviente del Dios Emperador. ¿A quién sirve? ¿A la humanidad o a sus enemigos? ¿Cómo se atreves a hablar de justicia con las manos manchadas de sangre? ¡Baje el arma si valoras su vida!».

languages.text: "Kendine bir bak Tanrı İmparator'un hizmetkârı. Kime hizmet ediyorsun? İnsanlığa mı yoksa düşmanlarına mı? Ellerinde hısmının kanı varken ne cüretle adaletten bahsedersin? Ruhuna değer veriyorsan indir silahını!"
languages.original_text: "Look at yourself, servant of the God-Emperor. Whom do you serve? Humanity or its foes? How dare you speak of justice with kindred blood on your hands? Lower your weapon if you value your soul!"

traits.locale_text: "Kendine bir bak Tanrı İmparator'un hizmetkârı. Kime hizmet ediyorsun? İnsanlığa mı yoksa düşmanlarına mı? Ellerinde hısmının kanı varken adaletten bahsetmeye nasıl cüret ediyorsun? Ruhuna değer veriyorsan indir silahını!"
